mapper.select: select notice_idx, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt from Notice_tbl
mapper.insert: insert into Notice_tbl(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select notice_idx, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt from Notice_tbl where notice_idx = #{notice_idx}

select notice_idx, title, writer, regDate, viewCnt from Notice_tbl
WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE writer LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by notice_idx desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
